Text:
...if VLC doesn't play it properly, your video is broken and people should find another, more proper, copy....

Windows Media Player is junk....Quicktime is worst, Divx Player ain't bad but VLC is top notch....anything not meeting it's standards ain't worth the download...btw

...Thanks for letting me know you screwed up the audio tho.....Will try and see if it works. Good job on the upload tho!
